items.title: Voice AI that actually converts: New TTS model boosts sales 15% for major brands
items.description: A new spoken language model can quickly generate “infinite” new voices of varying genders, ages, demographics, based on a simple text prompt.

items.title: Google claims Gemini 2.5 Pro preview beats DeepSeek R1 and Grok 3 Beta in coding performance
items.description: Google said the newest version of Gemini 2.5 Pro, now on preview, gives faster and more creative responses while performing better than OpenAI's o3.

items.title: Solidroad just raised $6.5M to reinvent customer service with AI that coaches, not replaces
items.description: Dublin AI startup Solidroad raises $6.5M from First Round Capital to transform customer service training with AI that coaches human agents and improve...

items.title: How much information do LLMs really memorize? Now we know, thanks to Meta, Google, Nvidia and Cornell
items.description: Using a clever solution, researchers find GPT-style models have a fixed memorization capacity of approximately 3.6 bits per parameter.

items.title: Securing AI at scale: Databricks and Noma close the inference vulnerability gap
items.description: Databricks Ventures and Noma Security partner to tackle critical AI inference vulnerabilities with real-time threat analytics, proactive red teaming, ...
